caption.p: Change in future risk of EVD cases caused by Zaire Ebola virus (EBOV) for 2070. Maps represent mean change in per grid cell (0.0416°—5.6 km at equator) EVD case probability from zero (yellow) to −0.06 (green) and 0.06 (red), aggregated at the country level with data from EMM simulations for 2070. Rows and columns show all reasonable combinations of the different scenarios of global change (GCAM-RCP4.5, AIM-RCP6.0, MESSAGE-RCP8.5 and SSP1 to 3)
